1496290.name: Lab 83
1496290.description:
Explore the serene world of lab 83 with its lovely blades, spikes, boulders and more. Summon cubes for literally no reason to get through the death-inflicting obstacles and fulfill your destiny to unlock the next level, and the one after that one, until you have completed all the levels!

Game Features


  • Create your own route through the level!
  • 5 different cubes to summon!
  • Over 55 levels!
  • 57 levels!
  • Many different traps to navigate!
  • Many ways to die!
